title: Spyker: Asynchronous Multi-Server Federated Learning for Geo-Distributed Clients
summaries: in the decentralized FL framework, propose __an asynchronous multi-server system__ that clients do asynchronous aggregation and servers do asynchronous model exchange to ensure efficiency in a multi-server environment
systemModel: geo-distributed clients are assigned to servers<ol>
clients interact with their assigned servers to do asynchronous FL
servers exchange models asynchronously whenever they detect that their ages differ too much
